Package index

üíº Account Classes

R6 classes for representing financial accounts: Main, Child, Grandchild.

MainAccount
MainAccount Class
ChildAccount
ChildAccount Class
GrandchildAccount
GrandAccount Class

üîß User Setup

Functions for initializing and managing user account structures.

create_user_account_base()
Create a New User Account.
is_valid_user_id()
Validate a User ID Format

üíæ File Helpers (Direct Filesystem)

Functions that interact directly with the filesystem (not via plugin).

file_exists_file()
Check if a User File Exists on the Local File System
save_to_file()
Save a User's File to the Local File System
load_from_file()
Load a User File from Local Filesystem
remove_from_file()
Remove a File from the Local File System

üîå Storage Plugin Interface

Plugin-based abstraction for reading and writing user files.

build_plugin_args()
Build Plugin Arguments for Storage Backend Functions
save_user_file()
Save a User-Specific File via Plugin Backend
load_user_file()
Load a User's File from the Storage Backend
remove_user_file()
Remove a User File via Configured Storage Backend
user_file_exists()
Check If a User File Exists via Configured Storage Backend

üîê Security & Locking

Token decoding and file-based locking for concurrency.

verify_token()
Decode and Verify a JWT Token
with_account_lock()
Acquire a Lock for a User's Account Tree

üì¶ MongoDB Storage Helpers

Functions for interacting with MongoDB storage backend.

get_mongo_conn()
Get or Create a MongoDB Connection
file_exists_mongo()
Check if a User File Exists in MongoDB
load_from_mongo()
Load a File from MongoDB
save_to_mongo()
Save an R Object to MongoDB
remove_from_mongo()
Remove a File from MongoDB
with_lock_mongo()
Acquire a MongoDB-Based Lock for a User's Account Tree

üß∞ Utility Functions

General-purpose utility functions used throughout the package.

coerce_numeric_date()
Coerce JWT NumericDate claims into POSIXct
safe_parse_date()
Safely Parse Flexible Date Inputs
retry_read_rds()
Retry reading RDS file
retry_save_rds()
Retry saveRDS with Delay and Limited Attempts

üîë Token & Tree Operations

Token issuing and minimal tree building helpers.

issue_token()
Issue a Signed JWT Token
minimal_tree()
Get a Minimal Version of the Account Tree
remove_account()
Remove an Account (Main or Sub-Account)
with_lock_file()
Acquire a File-Based Lock for a User's Account File
